column1: I didn't notice that we were led to the bamboo forest by the shooting stars.
Reimu! Someone's coming!
The area ahead is off-limits.
We've encountered a blocking, huh.
Who are you, and why should we stop?
My name is Rakuki Momosame
This has nothing to do with you,
so please go back, shrine maiden.
Since you know that I'm a shrine maiden,
it's my responsibility to solve this incident.
Let me through before I have to take action.
Reimu, calm down!
If by incident you mean the meteors,
soon they'll disappear.
Do not worry about it.
Looks like our words couldn't get through to her.
Someone is definitely planning something behind the scenes.
Once we have the time,
we will leave peacefully, so—
So we'll just defeat you for the truth.
How naive!
Faced with this Kotobiki Mountain Bow,
it will be futile no matter what you do.
How do we know if we don't try?
Don't underestimate us!
Since you are so anxious to know,
go find out when you go to Hell!
So we end up fighting again.
